Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation is a class representation of a reservation and the important information that it carries. It carries information like the name of the guest attributed to the reservation, the check-in and out dates, and the chosen Room. It can also provide a breakdown of the price per night given the duration of a guest's stay.

    Creates a Reservation object, asking for the full details of the guest's name, check-in and out dates, and the chosen Room.

      public Reservation(String guestName, int in_date, int in_month, int in_year, int out_date, int out_month, int out_year, Room chosenRoom)
      Creates a Reservation object, asking for the full details of the guest's name, check-in and out dates, and the chosen Room.
      Parameters:
      guestName - name of the guest
      in_date - date of the check-in date
      in_month - month of the check-in date
      in_year - year of the check-in date
      out_date - date of the check-out date
      out_month - month of the check-out date
      out_year - year of the check-out date
      chosenRoom - the chosen Room of the guest
